challengeName: Hercules PCDVR iOS App - MyStories pending and completed stories
detailedRequirements:
*Source Code*
All source code is in a private forum.  If you don’t have access, you’ll need to request access in the forum for this F2F.

More details on this project can be found here:

http://apps.topcoder.com/wiki/display/~ghostar/Hercules+Personal+Content+DVR+Apps

*My Stories*
Note that the “MyStories” branch of PCDVR is a separate project right now.  You should use the Magisto_PoC package in the PCDVR iOS Codebase thread in the private forum, not the regular PCDVR iOS codebase.  The functionality is only seen on iPad, under the “MyStories” option in the footer.

*ISSUE:*

Currently, in the MyStories proof of concept, we just send the story to the server, but we don't monitor its progress at all.  This F2F will fix that by making a couple changes.  Now, when the story is created, we can monitor the story's status using the "Check Movie Status" API call, and we can get the thumbnail and playback URL using the "Get Movie" API request.

1) This F2F will remove the mock for "Recent Stories" and "All Stories".  

2) When a movie is successfully uploaded, we will store the vsid locally in CoreData, in a new table

3) The app will show the pending and completed stories in "Recent Stories" and "All Stories".  Pending stories can just use the video placeholder icon for now, and completed stories should use the "thumb" value from Magisto

4) If there are pending stories, the status should be updated every 60 seconds while the MyStories screen is shown.

5) When a completed story is clicked, we should show the panel for playback, but the actual video will be used, and we will fill in the title and date on the popup.  The rest of the data on the popup can remain mocked for now. 

 

You can view the Magisto API reference here:

http://developers.magisto.com/API_Reference.html
